message.body: No it is chilly and been raining
that too bad. in philly it was hot and humid then at around 3 we had a crazy summer storm. it faded a way at 6irh now back in full force looks epic out there
WOW. here in San Francisco it is foggy and rainy today and tomorrow.
sucks. 90s all week overhere. why was it so boring today despite the weather
I was waiting on a friend to call and come by but it took nearly all day. And with the rain I just stayed in
yea i know what you mean people never make it on time lately. i am guilty of it too esp now that i have a baby
A baby is a good reason to be late or unreliable. Other things are excuses.
yea it takes forever to get out of the house sometimes as soon as all his needs are met something else ends up happening he gets hungry or poops or wants
but i am getting better at timing things out and knowing predictability of his needs.
